Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28539222]dengue virus 2(DENV2):inhibition of the activity of NS2B-NS3 protease(IC50= 2.3 μM); inhibition of virus-induced cytopathic effects (CPE) in BHK-21 cells(EC50=141.1 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The cyclic peptide could inhibit the activity of NS2B-NS3 protease, which is an essential enzyme for the replication of dengue virus.

Literature.Title: Discovery of novel cyclic peptide inhibitors of dengue virus NS2B-NS3 protease with antiviral activity.
Literature.Author: Takagi Y, Matsui K, Nobori H, Maeda H, Sato A, Kurosu T, Orba Y, Sawa H, Hattori K, Higashino K, Numata Y, Yoshida Y.
